SEARCH
Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.junit

Annotation Type JavacCompilerTest

@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) @ArgumentsSource(JavacCompilersProvider.class) @Documented @Inherited @ParameterizedTest(name="for compiler \"{0}\"") @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({ANNOTATION_TYPE,METHOD,TYPE}) public @interface JavacCompilerTest
Annotation that can be applied to a ParameterizedTest to enable passing in a range of JavacJctCompilerImpl instances with specific configured versions as the first parameter.
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    JavacCompilerTest.JavacCompilersProvider
    Argument provider for the JavacCompilerTest annotation.

  • Element Details

    • minVersion

      int minVersion
      Minimum version to use (inclusive).
      Returns:
      the minimum version.
      Default:
      -2147483648

    • maxVersion

      int maxVersion
      Maximum version to use (inclusive).
      Returns:
      the maximum version.
      Default:
      2147483647

    • configurers

      Class<? extends JctCompilerConfigurer.JctSimpleCompilerConfigurer>[] configurers
      Get an array of compiler configurers to apply in-order before starting the test.

      Each configurer must have a public no-args constructor, and their package must be open to this module if JPMS modules are in-use.

      Returns:
      an array of classes to run to configure the compiler. These run in the given order.
      Default:
      {}

    • modules

      boolean modules
      Whether we need to support modules or not.

      Setting this to true will skip any versions of the compiler that do not support JPMS modules.

      Returns:
      true if we need to support modules, or false if we do not.
      Default:
      false
